title: Proactive Social Engagement Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to proactively remind my socially isolated patients about upcoming social activities based on their interests so that I can help them stay connected and engaged without needing to monitor their schedules constantly.

title: Asynchronous Communication Support
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to send and receive text-based messaging reminders through ALFRED so that I can efficiently communicate with my patients and their families without interrupting my care routines.

title: Access to Local Community Resources
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to recommend local community events and resources to my socially isolated patients so that they can engage in activities that improve their emotional and social well-being.

title: Shared Activity Planning Tools
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want seamless calendar integration for care coordination so that I can efficiently manage medication schedules and patient visits without overlaps, while also supporting socially isolated patients through planned engagement activities.
